result.eng: He recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta

result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: Sometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ga: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.orig: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.html: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ponchtml: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní ṫugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.html: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ Séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.orig: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.html: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eileBe sensible and don't say such things.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteaċt eileBe sensible and don't say such things.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.

result.eng: He drank another gulp from it.
result.ga: Bhain sé slogóg eile as
result.orig: Bhain sé slogóg eile as
result.html: Bhain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.
